law.text:
// EFFECTIVE UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30, 2013 PER CHAPTER 451 OF 2012 //
In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Refund" means an individual's Maryland income tax refund.
"Warrant" means a criminal arrest warrant.
"Warrant" includes a warrant issued for or that results from:
a failure to appear before a court of the State;
a violation of the Maryland Vehicle Law that is punishable by a term of confinement; or
a violation of probation.
"Warrant" does not include a body attachment.
"Warrant official" means an official of the federal, State, or local government charged with serving a warrant.
